parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets value of the specified custom sound controller to be used in [[simple expression]]s in config. Returns [[true]] if value was set to the controller, [[false]] if command fails, for example if vehicle is not a transport or controller name is not recognised.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Custom sound controller name is <u>case sensitive</u> and of the following format:
<code>[[format]] ["CustomSoundController%1", _number]</code>
Where <tt>_number</tt> is a number from 1 to [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]] (currently 32)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCustomSoundController''' [vehicle, controller, value]

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a transport type vehicle (doesn't work on characters or buildings)

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> controller: [[String]] - name of the custom sound controller. Need to be full string like i.e. "CustomSoundController1". Currently you can pick from "CustomSoundController1" to "CustomSoundController32"

</value></part><part><name>p3 </name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - desired value
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] on success
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> Change value of CustomSoundController1 to 12<code>[[setCustomSoundController]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], "CustomSoundController1", 12];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[getCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
